mapper.insert: insert into order_tbl (mc_email, ord_name, ord_zipcode, ord_addr, ord_deaddr, ord_phone, ord_price) values (#{mc_email},#{ord_name},#{ord_zipcode},#{ord_addr},#{ord_deaddr},#{ord_phone},#{ord_price})
insert into ordetail_tbl select #{ord_code}, c.pro_num , c.cart_amount , p.pro_price from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.mc_email = #{mc_email}
mapper.select: select ot.ord_code, pt.pro_name, pt.pro_upfolder, pt.pro_img, ot.dt_price ,ot.dt_amount, pt2.payment_status from ordetail_tbl ot inner join product_tbl pt on ot.pro_num = pt.pro_num inner join payment_tbl pt2 on pt2.ord_code = ot.ord_code where ot.ord_code = #{ord_code}

select o.ord_code, o.ord_date, p.pro_upfolder, p.pro_img, p.pro_name, ot.pro_num, ot.dt_amount, ot.dt_price, pt.payment_status from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl ot on o.ord_code = ot.ord_code inner join product_tbl p on p.pro_num = ot.pro_num inner join payment_tbl pt on ot.ord_code = pt.ord_code where o.mc_email = #{mc_email} order by o.ord_date desc limit #{cri.pageStart},#{cri.perPageNum}

select count(*) from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl ot on o.ord_code = ot.ord_code inner join product_tbl p on p.pro_num = ot.pro_num inner join payment_tbl pt on ot.ord_code = pt.ord_code where o.mc_email = #{mc_email}
